summary: A bug in the RetryOptions setter where the maximum interval parameter incorrectly sets the initial interval instead. This causes incorrect retry behavior for activities.
userImpact: Activities use incorrect initial retry intervals, causing unpredictable retry behavior in production workflows.
rootCause: The setter for maximum interval in RetryOptions.php line 172 incorrectly assigns the value to the initial interval property instead of the maximum interval property.
proposedFix: Fix the setter to correctly assign the maximum interval parameter to the maximum interval property.
keyQuote: setter for maximum interval sets the initial interval
